"We heard that religious looney crack fool. And there's another reason the 
energon can't hurt us. We have a pretender shell protecting us from the 
radiation. Now, try and guess which of us is the real me," the Recons all 
said at once.


>From: Rudra656@...
>Reply-To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: Re: Chivtrons' base
>Date: Fri, 9 Mar 2001 22:37:22 EST
>
>OOC: My head hurts.  Loony is not to be confused with Moony although a 
>Moony
>is typically considered a religious nut.
>
>::Aerotaur::
>     As he stands watching this he thinks to himself *Oh good we got 
>another
>loony on our hands.  And a religious loony at that.*  "Perplex.  Take a 
>break
>inside.  The last thing we need right now is for you to go insane too."  He
>looks at the exposed energon.  It wasn't a large amount.  "Windlord, 
>Perplex,
>clear out."  He flew upward and fired one shot at the energon detonating 
>it.
>The ensuing explosion wasn't enough to kill anything that wasn't right on 
>top
>of it, but it would do some minor damage to the base.
